resources.string: Pong is one of the earliest arcade video games; it is a tennis sports game featuring simple two-dimensional graphics. While other arcade video games such as Computer Space came before it, Pong was one of the first video games to reach mainstream popularity. The aim is to defeat an opponent in a simulated table-tennis game by earning a higher score. \n\nPong - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia. 2014. Pong - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.
